TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DbFunctionsExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides CLR methods that get translated to database functions when used in LINQ to Entities queries. The methods on this class are accessed via .
Docs.remarks: See Database functions for more information and examples.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Like (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, string matchExpression, string pattern);
.method public static hidebysig bool Like(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, string matchExpression, string pattern) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Like (_ As DbFunctions, matchExpression As String, pattern As String) As Boolean
static member Like : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions * string * string -> bool
public static bool Like (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, string? matchExpression, string? pattern);

Docs.param: The string that is to be matched.
The pattern which may involve wildcards %,_,[,],^.
Docs.summary: An implementation of the SQL LIKE operation. On relational databases this is usually directly translated to SQL.

remarks.para: Note that the semantics of the comparison will depend on the database configuration. In particular, it may be either case-sensitive or case-insensitive.

This DbFunction method has no in-memory implementation and will throw if the query switches to client-evaluation. This can happen if the query contains one or more expressions that could not be translated to the store.

static member Like : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions * string * string * string -> bool
public static bool Like (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, string? matchExpression, string? pattern, string? escapeCharacter);

Docs.param: The string that is to be matched.
The pattern which may involve wildcards %,_,[,],^.
The escape character (as a single character string) to use in front of %,_,[,],^ if they are not used as wildcards.
Docs.summary: An implementation of the SQL LIKE operation. On relational databases this is usually directly translated to SQL.

remarks.para: Note that the semantics of the comparison will depend on the database configuration. In particular, it may be either case-sensitive or case-insensitive.

This DbFunction method has no in-memory implementation and will throw if the query switches to client-evaluation. This can happen if the query contains one or more expressions that could not be translated to the store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig float64 Random(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Random (_ As DbFunctions) As Double

Docs.summary: A random double number generator which generates a number between 0 and 1, exclusive.
Docs.returns: A random double number between 0 and 1, exclusive.
Docs.remarks: This DbFunction method has no in-memory implementation and will throw if the query switches to client-evaluation. This can happen if the query contains one or more expressions that could not be translated to the store.
